text:
My goal is to make a
positive impact every day

on the people and
the world around me.

In 2016, I lost my
brother in a car accident.

And three years
later, I lost my dad.

Their losses changed who I
am and changed my perspective

They taught me that
time is not guaranteed.

And while it's
easy to be focused

on the pursuit of
accomplishment, each one of us

has an opportunity
every day to make

a difference in
the lives around us

by slowing down
and being present.

My purpose is to
help people realize

that while setting goals
is incredibly important,
the prize is in the journey.

And we have an opportunity
to change the lives around us
every day in big and small ways.
